simpledc.title: Philosophy at Cambridge, Newsletter of the Faculty of Philosophy, Issue 11
simpledc.creator: Lecky-Thompson, Jenni
simpledc.subject: Philosophy
Cambridge
simpledc.description: Newsletter of the Philosophy Faculty. Articles by: Tim Crane, 'From the Chair' ; Jacob Trefethen, 'Safeguarding the Future: The Centre for the Study of Existential Risk'; Sophia Connell, 'Judith Jarvis Thomson Visit'; Tom Stern, 'Raymond Geuss Retires'; Michael Potter, 'Logic and Assertion'; Claire Benn, 'The Cambridge Women in Philosophy Group'; Francis Young, 'A Philosophical Defence of Monarchy; Huw Price, 'Choice, by George?'.
